com.linecorp.armeria.server.grpc

Class GrpcServiceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.grpc.GrpcServiceBuilder

  • public final class GrpcServiceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs a GrpcService to serve GRPC services from within Armeria.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GrpcServiceBuilder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GrpcServiceBuilder addService(io.grpc.BindableService bindableService)
      Adds a GRPC BindableService to this GrpcServiceBuilder.
      GrpcServiceBuilder addService(io.grpc.ServerServiceDefinition service)
      Adds a GRPC ServerServiceDefinition to this GrpcServiceBuilder, such as what's returned by BindableService.bindService().
      GrpcService build()
      Constructs a new GrpcService that can be bound to ServerBuilder.
      GrpcServiceBuilder compressorRegistry(io.grpc.CompressorRegistry registry)
      Sets the CompressorRegistry to use when compressing messages.
      GrpcServiceBuilder decompressorRegistry(io.grpc.DecompressorRegistry registry)
      Sets the DecompressorRegistry to use when decompressing messages.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GrpcServiceBuilder

        public GrpcServiceBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • addService

        public GrpcServiceBuilder addService(io.grpc.ServerServiceDefinition service)
        Adds a GRPC ServerServiceDefinition to this GrpcServiceBuilder, such as what's returned by BindableService.bindService().

      • addService

        public GrpcServiceBuilder addService(io.grpc.BindableService bindableService)
        Adds a GRPC BindableService to this GrpcServiceBuilder. Most GRPC service implementations are BindableServices.

      • decompressorRegistry

        public GrpcServiceBuilder decompressorRegistry(io.grpc.DecompressorRegistry registry)
        Sets the DecompressorRegistry to use when decompressing messages. If not set, will use the default, which supports gzip only.

      • compressorRegistry

        public GrpcServiceBuilder compressorRegistry(io.grpc.CompressorRegistry registry)
        Sets the CompressorRegistry to use when compressing messages. If not set, will use the default, which supports gzip only.

      • build

        public GrpcService build()
        Constructs a new GrpcService that can be bound to ServerBuilder. As GRPC services themselves are mounted at a path that corresponds to their protobuf package, you will almost always want to bind to a prefix, e.g. by using ServerBuilder.serviceUnder(String, Service).
